title.rendered: CMMC Back to Basics: 7 Tips for Manufacturing Leaders

content.rendered:
CMMC Back to Basics 7 Tips for Manufacturing Leaders

 

As the manufacturing industry becomes increasingly interconnected and dependent on digital systems, cybersecurity has become a critical concern. The Cybersecurity Maturity Model Certification (CMMC) framework has emerged as a vital requirement for defense contractors. In this webinar, we will explore the fundamental principles of CMMC and provide manufacturing leaders with seven essential tips to enhance their cybersecurity posture and achieve compliance.

You’ll learn:

• The foundational elements of the CMMC framework and its implications for manufacturing organizations

• The “why” behind the Defense Department’s CMMC initiative

• Potential cybersecurity risks specific to the manufacturing industry, especially the handling of controlled unclassified information (CUI)

• How manufacturers can get started on their CMMC compliance journey


About Our Speakers:

Karl Bickmore (CEO) and Ted Hulsy (CRO) each have over twenty years of experience of helping businesses raise the bar on cybersecurity and compliance. They will share their first-hand experience with helping clients achieve CMMC compliance. Want more educational assets on managed IT services & cybersecurity?

Reach out to us! https://www.snaptechit.com/contact/CMMC Back to Basics 7 Tips for Manufacturing Leaders
